features: A Gentle Face Cleanser With Real Results -It’s fluffy, it’s foamy, and it’s fresh. For the cleanest, softest face, our fragrance-free gentle face wash is perfect to remove any dirt and impurities without leaving your face feeling tight or dry with our face wash for sensitive skin.

Balance And Brighten Your Skin - Foaming facial cleanser balances pH tones, primes, moisturizes, hydrates, and refreshes your skin! Make self-care time the best time with our soothing facial cleanser for sensitive skin.
Unique Formula - Unlike any other facial cleanser, our gentle cleanser is vegan, paraben and sulfate-free with effective clean ingredients. Infused Hyaluronic Acid .
Loved By Thousands - Gentle facial cleanser is a must-have in your daily skin-care routine! Facial Cleanser for women or men is the perfect gift for those who enjoy self-care and being pampered.

30 Day Feel Good Policy - High-quality, vegan and cruelty free skin care that makes "me-time" the best time. If you aren't 100% happy with your facial cleaner, simply let us know and we will make it right. Try the skin cleanser with our 7-in-1 Spin Brush!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great makeup remover
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent makeup remover. I liked the texture and how the oil easily spread all over my face. Some may find it greasy but I liked It because it easily removed all my makeup including eye makeup. It did not irritate my skin or break me out. I have only used it twice so far so I’ll update if anything changes. But I like this much better than what I was previously using which was the Clinique Take the Day off cleansing balm. It works better and is more affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The perfect makeup remover. I have delicate skin, and removing make-up has always been a problem. The grace and stella balm Is perfect. The oily cream melts gently any makeup from my face. No scrubbing at all. Washing my face with warm water removes all the oil and melted make-up, and I'm back to my Natural skin in no time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, Great Price
reviews.reviewText: After much resistance, I’m a total convert to the double cleanse. Using a cleansing balm, like G&S, removes my daily SPF and keeps the next step (regular cleanser) from overstripping my skin’s natural moisture barrier. My skin no longer feels dry & tight after double cleansing.Love the amount of product you get here for the price. One jar lasted me almost 3 months. No blurry eyes or breakouts or irritation after using it.Comparing it to more expensive cleansing balms I’ve tried, it doesn’t rinse off quite as well & no scent (I do enjoy a subtle luxurious fragrance to my skincare as part of the overall experience), but it works well as part of a double cleanse and is a great value. If you’re searching for an affordable effective cleansing balm, look no further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Takes it all off
reviews.reviewText: This balm does a good job removing makeup (even waterproof mascara) with little effort. It melts into a nice balmy texture rapidly. It does not get milky when water is added and remains highly moisturized even after thorough rinsing. It is a good first cleanse and you could be done at that if you like your skin feeling moisturized.The 4 star rating is due to more of a preference, I don’t like the remaining feeling of having moisturized my face. But for those with very dry skin or who do like that feeling this would probably be amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product, light, foams nicely, just one pump is more than enough, the smell is nice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing face balm makeup remover
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is an amazing makeup remover, I bought it cause my teacher at school recommended a balm for makeup removal. This balm is actually great. I love it, 5 stars, highly recommended will be purchasing again, my skin seems to be taking to it very well no allergic reactions, just silky smooth skin, always leaves my skin feeling super fresh! Don’t hesitate to purchase this cleansing balm. Amazing makeup remover and my skin feel moisturizer after use. Two thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size is not suitable
reviews.reviewText: The sizing is not what I expected, the bottle is very small. Other than that the product itself was really smooth on my face. Other than that I will not reorder due to the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good makeup remover - careful with the eyes
reviews.reviewText: I like this product a lot! It works well and removed the makeup great. Just be careful when removing makeup from eyes. Can be irritating if you get the cream inside. Rub gently around eyes.

This cleansing Face Balm is very, very nice. It comes with a small scoop which gives a nice portion for cleansing. You add a scoop to your clean hands. Apply onto your DRY face. Gently massaging all over. Rinse with warm water. Dry. My face feels clean and soft. It doesn't leave a residue on your skin. No allergic reaction as it's a vegan product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is lovely and does exactly what it says. Very easy to use and leaves skin feeling clean and refreshed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ottimo. Da usare con una spugnetta.
reviews.reviewText: Ottimo prodotto. Strucca molto bene ogni tipo di trucco,anche waterproof. Bisogna solo avere l'accortezza di usare una spugnetta per risciacquare il viso alla fine. Delicato non brucia la pelle rimane morbida
Das Produkt hält was es verspricht. Das Make-up lässt sich super leicht entfernen.
Excellent produit qui nettoie bien le visage tout en douceur
